alert.note: Alert for East Honolulu; Kauai East; Koolau Windward; Olomana (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 08 at 3:23PM HST until August 09 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND MAUI AND MOLOKAI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI AND OAHU... .High surf along east facing shores due to a combination of very strong winds, large seas and an east-southeast swell generated from Dora should diminish tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...East facing shores of Kauai and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: East Honolulu; Kauai East; Koolau Windward; Olomana
